features: Designed for you: Our patented V-shaped design delivers support and comfort no matter how you sleep – on your side, stomach or back
Stay centered: Integrated into the patterning and construction, they provide a secure, comfortable sleep by centering you on the pad and inhibiting air movement while tossing and turning
Extra warm: Unlike traditional pads that flatten the bag’s fill, Deep Welds create expansion zones that allow your bag to fully loft beneath you for improved thermal comfort.
